results.definition: formally making a person known to another or to the public
a show or display; the act of presenting something to sight or view
(obstetrics) position of the fetus in the uterus relative to the birth canal
examples: Cesarean sections are sometimes the result of abnormal presentations

results.definition: the activity of formally presenting something (as a prize or reward)
examples: she gave the trophy but he made the presentation

results.definition: the act of making something publicly available; presenting news or other information by broadcasting or printing it
examples: he prepared his presentation carefully in advance

results.definition: the act of presenting a proposal
